name: Mortification
summary: Your reckonings have prepared your body for physical punishment.
description:
Your reckonings have prepared your body for physical punishment. Choose bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, based on the nature of your physical reckonings. You gain resistance to the chosen damage type equal to your number of class feats from the Hellknight Armiger archetype and other Hellknight archetypes.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
